TextView.android:text: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are

Eventually, we have forgotten the habbit of meditation in open spaces thanks to scarcity of gardens and parks. Virtual Reality is a solution to this problem. One can meditate using our Virtual Instructor App while living in his homes instead of stepping out. Our product offers a virtual instructor who teaches meditation and one can practice it virtually while being inside homes. Currently, we have launched the test version of the app, which contains 3-d environments without any instructor, but you can still enjoy meditation in VR

As this is the test version of the app. So, we have provided three different 3-d environments to practice meditation in virtual reality. Try them and let us know how you feel. We'll be adding more environments in further updates
NOTE:- Must read the meditation guidelines under help section before trying.
